title: Hi, I'm Rifky
description: Experienced IT Programmer with over 3 years in Full Stack Web Development, proficient in technologies like PHP, Node.js, Next.js, and SQL. At PT Jurnalindo Aksara Grafika (Bisnis Indonesia Group), I have contributed to the development and enhancement of key digital platforms such as JAGO 2.0, Karier Bisnis Indonesia, and HRIS systems. Collaborating with System Analysts, UI/UX designers, and QA teams, I ensure high-quality and performance-driven solutions that meet business objectives.

My journey in tech began as a Laboratory Assistant at Universitas Gunadarma, where I honed my leadership and technical mentoring skills. Since then, Iâ€™ve successfully developed websites and IT systems for PT Koda Jaya and PT Forkindo Utama, showcasing my ability to translate complex client requirements into functional, scalable digital solutions.
Passionate about delivering impactful technology solutions, I continuously strive to enhance my expertise and contribute to the growth of innovative projects.
